attributes.description:
+ Optional 12 Month Warranty Available.

+ Vehicle is in a immaculate condition, come and view this vehicle.

+ We Deliver Nationwide, we are based just 40 min from Johannesburg.

+ Finance can be arranged.

+ Trade-Ins Welcome.

Why you must buy from Koos & Mike Used Cars:

1. Our Prices includes on the road cost.(CASH BUYS)

2. All our cars comes with a roadworthy certificate.

3. All cars will be delivered with a oil service before delivery.

4. Paperwork is our priority and not your responsibility.

5. Finance approvals is our goal.

6. You are our customer our advertisement and our reference for tomorrow.

7. The first 5 services on the car will be half price.

8. Warranty option available on all our cars (not included in selling price, can be taken out additionally)

9. We buy decent cars for cash.

10. All our cars have cartrack pre-installed. (Ts & Cs apply)

11. You get 1 free Valet for your vehicle before delivery

12. We offer an optional warranty package on all our vehicles with an R 7990 - R 19 000 installment

13. Ts & Cs APPLY

Please contact us for vehicle availability before you waste time and money on transport (our stock sells fast)
